administrative.name: Woburn Intensive cereals
administrative.description: On Woburn Stackyard I field, on the site of the previous Woburn Continuous Wheat and Barley experiments (W/XW/6 and W/XB/6). An experiment comparing winter wheat and spring barley grown continuously and in rotation was started in 1967. A five-course rotation of 1-year grass ley, potatoes and three years of either wheat or barley.
administrative.disambiguatingDescription: To study the effects of intensive cereal cropping on yield, incidence of soil-borne pathogens and organic matter in the soil.
